text: Saintes is a French commune and historic town, a subprefecture in the Charente-Maritime department in southwestern France. It is in the Nouvelle- Aquitaine region. It is also the capital of the arrondissement of Saintes. Before the French Revolution, Saintes was the capital of the old province of Saintonge. ==Geography== Saintes is in the central eastern part of the Charente-Maritime department, in the old province of Saintonge, along the Charente river that flows through the commune from south to north.
